channel.title: XenoCanto on Coded bioacoustics
channel.description: Recent content in XenoCanto on Coded bioacoustics

item.title: Interactive maps from Xeno-Canto recording localities in xc_maps()
item.author: marcelo.araya@ucr.ac.cr (Marcelo Araya-Salas)
item.description: xc_maps() let users visualize the geographic spread of recordings from Xeno-Canto downloaded through the quer_xc() function. However, the graphs are static, which becomes a bit painful when looking at many recordings. Fortunately the R package leaflet allows to create interactive maps in which users can zoom in at specific areas, check observation medatada and link observations to their Xeno-Canto webpage. Here are a couple of examples on how to create this maps using xc_maps().
